mapper.select: select ei.employee_id, ei.employee_name, ei.employee_phone, ei.employee_add_time, ei.department_id, di.department_name, ei.enable_flag from employees_inf ei left join department_inf di on ei.department_id = di.department_id

select ei.employee_id, ei.employee_name, ei.employee_phone, ei.employee_add_time, ei.department_id, di.department_name, ei.enable_flag, ei.password_md5 from employees_inf ei left join department_inf di on ei.department_id = di.department_id where employee_id = #{id}

select ei.employee_id, ei.employee_name, ei.employee_phone, ei.employee_add_time, ei.department_id, di.department_name, ei.enable_flag, ei.password_md5 from employees_inf ei left join department_inf di on ei.department_id = di.department_id where employee_phone = #{phone}

select count(employee_id) from employees_inf where 1 = 1
and employee_name like #{nameCondition}
